      • Station

        public Station(int pumpNo,
               int tillNo,
               double p,
               double q,
               boolean isTruck)
        Parameters:
        pumpNo - the number of pumps in the station
        tillNo - the number of tills in the station
        p - double representing the probability of p
        q - double representing the probability of q
        isTruck - boolean determining whether the simulation contains trucks or not

      • addVehicleToPump

        public boolean addVehicleToPump(Vehicle vehicle)
        Decides if the vehicle can be added to a pump, if there are no available pumps the loss calculation method is called
        Parameters:
        vehicle - a Vehicle to be added to a pump
        Returns:
        a boolean, which is true if the vehicle is sucessfully added to a queue and false otherwise

        Returns:
